name: Berry Nut and Seed Crunch
author: Chef Boyardee
summary: The glazed walnuts make this a sweet but healthy snack. Vegan and GF! This can be used on cereal or folded into quinoa for breakfast, or added to mixed greens for a great salad. I keep some tucked away in my desk drawer - a handful makes a great mid-day snack.
directions: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Heat brown sugar in a saucepan over medium-low heat until melted; stir in walnuts and sesame seeds until walnuts are coated with sugar and sesame seeds
Transfer coated walnuts to the prepared baking sheet; set aside until cooled
Mix coated walnuts, pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds, and cranberries together in a bowl
